messages.message: The "@Entry" decorator that has a "LocalStorage" type parameter cannot be used together with the "@ComponentV2" decorator.
The "@Entry" decorator that has "storage" or "useSharedStorage" parameters cannot be used together with the "@ComponentV2" decorator.
